chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: AbsRing
V: NormedModule K
U: NormedModule K
F: (U -> Prop) -> Prop
FF: Filter F
l: U -> V
g: U -> V
f: U -> V

Goal:
(forall y : U, f y = g y) -> filterdiff f F l -> filterdiff g F l

Premises:
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
filterdiff = fun (f : U -> V) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (l : U -> V) => is_linear l /\ (forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> is_domin F (fun y : U => minus y x) (fun y : U => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) (l (minus y x)))) : (U -> V) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> V) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope function_scope]
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
ex_filterdiff_ext_loc = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f g : U -> V) (H : F (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) (H1 : ex_filterdiff f F) => match H1 with | @ex_intro _ _ l Hl => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff g F l0) l (filterdiff_ext_loc f g l H H0 Hl) end : forall F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop, Filter F -> forall f g : U -> V, F (fun y : U => f y = g y) -> (forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) ->...-> ex_filterdiff g F Arguments F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [function_scope _ function_scope function_scope _ function_scope _]
filterdiff_ext_loc = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f g l : U -> V) (H : F (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) (__top_assumption_ : filterdiff f F l) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : is_linear l) (b : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> is_domin F (fun y : U => minus y x) (fun y : U => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) (l (minus y x)))), (fun _ : is_linear l /\ (forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> is_domin F (fun y : U => minus y x) (fun y : U => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) (l (minus y x)))) => filterdiff g F l...
ball_norm_eq : forall x y : ?V, (forall eps : posreal, ball_norm x eps y) -> x = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
filterdiff_ext_locally = fun (f g : U -> V) (x : U) (l : U -> V) (H : locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y)) => filterdiff_ext_loc f g l H (fun (y : U) (Hy : is_filter_lim (locally x) y) => match H with | @ex_intro _ _ d Hd => Hd y (let H0 : x = y := is_filter_lim_locally_unique x y Hy in eq_ind x (fun y0 : U => ball x d y0) (ball_center x d) y H0) end) : forall (f g : U -> V) (x : U) (l : U -> V), locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y) -> filterdiff f (locally x) l -> filterdiff g (locally x) l Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope _ function_scope _ _]
filterlim_locally : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f0 ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f0 x))) where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- UniformSpace] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U ->...-> V |- Filter ?F]

ex_filterdiff_ext_locally = fun (f g : U -> V) (x : U) (H : locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : ex_filterdiff f (locally x)) => match H0 with | @ex_intro _ _ l Hl => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff g (locally x) l0) l (filterdiff_ext_locally f g x l H Hl) end : forall (f g : U -> V) (x : U), locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y) -> ex_filterdiff f (locally x) -> ex_filterdiff g (locally x) Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope _ _ _]
eq_close : forall x y : ?V, close x y -> x = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_triangle : forall x y : ?V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]

norm_triangle_inv : forall x y : ?V, Rabs (norm x - norm y) <= norm (minus x y) where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
continuous_scal : forall (k : ?U -> ?K) (f0 : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), continuous k x -> continuous f0 x -> continuous (fun y : ?U => scal (k y) (f0 y)) x where ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- UniformSpace] ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
equiv_carac_1 : forall f0 g0 o : ?T -> ?V, (forall x : ?T, f0 x = plus (g0 x) (o x)) -> is_domin ?F g0 o -> is_equiv ?F f0 g0 where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- Type] ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U ->...-> V |- Filter ?F]

unifcont_normed_1d : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous f0 x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> ball x delta y -> ball_norm (f0 x) eps (f0 y)} where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]
ball_norm_sym : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : posreal), ball_norm x eps y -> ball_norm y eps x where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- NormedModule ?K]

plus_comm : forall x y : ?G, plus x y = plus y x where ?G : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- AbelianGroup]
domin_rw_l : forall (f1 f2 : ?T -> ?U) (g0 : ?T -> ?V), is_equiv ?F f1 f2 -> is_domin ?F f1 g0 -> is_domin ?F f2 g0 where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- Type] ?Ku : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U -> V |- AbsRing] ?Kv : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : U -> V g : U -> V l : U ->...-> V |- Filter ?F]
